text.section: An inmate in the program is responsible for all of the inmate's living expenses, including those for food, clothing, shelter, and utilities.

Unless otherwise allowed by the Commissioner or the Commissioner's designee, as a condition of participation in the program, an inmate shall make any court ordered payments for the support of dependents.
